articles.title: When kitchen makeovers are the product of stressful holiday hosting
articles.description:
Homeowners are often forced to see what their kitchens are lacking during family gatherings. In the new year, a growing number are deciding to do something about it.

The post When kitchen makeovers are the product of stressful holiday hosting appeared first on Boston.com.
